      • nameValidation

        public boolean nameValidation(java.lang.String name)
        Check name with the rules: Student name consists of alphanumeric characters (a-zA-Z0-9), lowercase, or uppercase. Student name allowed of the dot (.), underscore (_), and hyphen (-) and space ( ). The dot (.), underscore (_), hyphen (-), or space ( ) must not be the first or last character. The dot (.), underscore (_), or hyphen (-) or space ( ) does not appear consecutively The number of characters must be between 2 to 50.
        Parameters:
        name: - name to check
        Returns:
        valid status of the name
